overview: Hot, hung daddy Max Sargent isn't happy that his gorgeous son (Troy Accola) has gotten a boyfriend (Michael Delray) while he's away at college. When Troy brings Michael home for spring break, Daddy Max does everything in his power to intimidate the tall, dark and handsome young stud. But does Max's contempt mask his own raging attraction for the sexy younger man? Bearded roommate Brendan Patrick tries to get to the bottom of the older man's psyche while simultaneously getting into everyone's bed. Starring Max Sargent, Brendan Patrick, Troy Accola, Michael Delray.
title: His Son's Best Friend 3
